name: European Competitive Telecommunications Association
goal:
- Assist and encourage market liberalisation and competition
- Represent the telecommunications industry to key government and regulatory bodies
- Maintain a forum for networking and business development throughout Europe
- Assist new market entrants through pro-competitive policies
- Continually reflect the dynamic nature of the telecommunications industry
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Economic and Financial Affairs, General and Institutional Affairs, Home Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives:
Telecom Single Market regulation
Digital Single Market
Telecoms Framework Review
Connected and automated driving
